sections.heading: of petition; by whom.A petition under section 30-3415 or 30-3421 may be filed by any of the following:(1) The principal;(2) The attorney in fact;(3) The spouse, parent, sibling, or adult child of the principal;(4) A close adult friend of the principal;(5) The guardian of the principal;(6) The attend
sections.text: of petition; by whom.A petition under section 30-3415 or 30-3421 may be filed by any of the following:(1) The principal;(2) The attorney in fact;(3) The spouse, parent, sibling, or adult child of the principal;(4) A close adult friend of the principal;(5) The guardian of the principal;(6) The attending physician or other health care provider; or(7) Any other interested party.SourceLaws 1992, LB 696, ยง 22;Laws 1993, LB 782, ยง 26.
